data.title: Excursion to the Punilla Valley in Cordoba
data.meta_description: Book the Punilla Valley Tour in Cordoba with Daytours4u and visit the charming mountain villages during your trip to Argentina!
data.text:
The Punilla Valley Tour by Daytours4u will take you to know the rivers, mountain villages and impressive landscapes in the Cordoba surroundings during your holidays in Argentina. This tour is perfect for those who wish to relax and escape the noise of urban areas while enjoying nature in what is one of the most beautiful regions of South America. Book online, quickly and safely with various forms of payment available to facilitate your purchase, and live this reenergizing experience!

This excursion to the Punilla Valley starts from Córdoba and goes to the mountain village of La Calera. The tour also includes visits to the San Roque dam and the towns of Molinari, Valle Hermoso, La Falda, Huerta Grande, Villa Giardino, La Cumbre, Cruz Chica, Cruz Grande, Los Cocos, and Cosquín. You can even ride a cable car and have a panoramic view of the entire Punilla Valley. Plus the tour includes visits to Tanti, Pekos, Fantastic World and the famous Villa Carlos Paz.

Throughout this long journey, you will take perfect pictures of the magnificent mountain landscapes of the region and learn more about its culture, while relaxing in this natural, welcoming, and quiet environment. At the Villa Carlos Paz, you will be able to see a real cuckoo clock and taste an authentic and delicious alfajor, the Argentine national sweet, produced by a factory in this mountain village around Cordoba.
